description:
Empowered by black blood, Crona proves difficult to defeat. With their survival on the line, Maka and Soul push themselves to the brink of madness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bataille de résonance du Sang Noir ! Le combat d`une petite âme contre la peur ?
Kokketsu no Kyoumeisen: Kyoufu ni Hamukau Chiisana Tamashii no Daifuntou?
La battaglia dell`eco del Sangue Nero! La grande lotta di una piccola anima contro la paura?
The Black Blood Resonance Battle! A Small Soul`s Grand Struggle Against Fear?
黒血の共鳴戦 ~恐怖に刃向かう小さな魂の大奮闘?~
